title: Red Dead Redemption
description: America, 1911. The end of the Wild West era has begun. John Marston is a former outlaw who has been forced to hunt down his former gang members by the government. He must travel across the vast and dangerous American frontier, facing treacherous terrain, wild animals, and ruthless outlaws. As he searches for his old friends, he must also confront his own past and make difficult choices that will determine his fate. Red Dead Redemption is an epic tale of revenge, redemption, and the struggle for survival in a lawless land.
